revised_title: A Case Study of Stone-Like Objects Voided by a Young Girl
tldr: A young girl suffering from colic and nephritic pains passed three stone-like objects through her stool. The objects were composed of a gritty substance mixed with downy material and a central glassy particle. The author suggests that the objects may have originated from tobacco pipes and food particles, such as mutton fat and peach skin, ingested by the girl.
